img.br: The application period for the 2020-2021 school year has begun. The application period will continue until all open spots have been filled. (Click Item to Read More)

2019-2020 Yearbook sales have started! Orders can be placed by visiting strawbridge.net & using online code YB112843 or by submitting an order form. Order forms are available in the main office. Yearbooks are $25.00 each. Be sure to place your order now so you are guaranteed a Yearbook! POCS does not purchase additional yearbooks.

section.p: To provide an opportunity for students to learn in a safe, caring, respectful environment, where their individuality is valued and their individual needs are addressed.
Positive Outcomes Charter School develops graduates who are self-reliant citizens that are lifelong learners who contribute with integrity within their community.
